content:
Understood. Here's an updated character:

[Name = Markus Ironfist]
[Background = Blacksmith]
[Description = A rugged man in his forties with broad shoulders and a bushy beard, wears a leather apron over his soot-stained tunic and pants]
[Personality = gruff, skilled with his hands, values hard work and fairness]

{Markus Ironfist} is in need of rare metals to forge a custom order for a wealthy client. He is seeking adventurers to help gather these metals from the nearby {Dragon's Teeth Mines}.
